hazard_tag: Qualitative hazard classification (e.g. high hazard, low hazard)
solubility_tag: Qualitative solubility classification (e.g. very soluble, poorly soluble)
spectra_tag: Available spectra types (comma-separated, e.g. 1D NMR, UV, Raman)
notable_peak: Key UV or MS peak (e.g. 227 nm or 194 m/z)
